locations.title: Tiger Discount
locations.content: Tiger Discount may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ If you ride with your wife or husband get ready to get obligated to pay for two showers. POLICIES THEY SAID, BUT ITS ABOUT MONEY AT THE END OF THE DAY. You can‚Äôt even pay for one and take a shower one at a time. ‚Ä¶

Great high pressure shower for 8.00. Free shampoo and soap. Drivers lounge open and has leather recliners. The parking lot has concrete paid spots and free dirt spots. Free wifi. I usually go to chain truck stops so this was a great change. ‚Ä¶
Great place. Good price for a shower. Glad I found it. Employee was nice.

Nice people working there. But the showers are a bit nasty. They are wiped down and mopped but not really "cleaned". Just look at the tile and the bottom of the shower curtain, you'll see. The parking lot is a joke. You'd think as busy as ‚Ä¶
Good place to park. Hot Shower. Food. Anything you need!

I paid $700 in diesel here in a week, went for a shower, and they said I was past 24 hours. Being tired I did some sleeping. Lots of us have to catch some rest.  There is no reason to deny a shower after buying so much overpriced fuel. It ‚Ä¶
Nice trk stop. They don't  gouge you on getting a shower like the big four if you don't  buy 50-60 gal of fuel.  There is also a real food resturand within a couple hundred feet.

It's sad that after a hard day on the road, you come in get fuel and go to bed assuming you have a shower coming after fueling up with receipt to prove it only to be told you have to take that shower within 24 hours or pay for it. Hell, ‚Ä¶
Paid $8 Bucks For A Shower.

locations.content: Sweet Crude Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ bit run down. There is no diesel fuel. You have to get diesel in the can inside. The showers are free, which is great. The showers are not bad. If I were to compare them to a TA truck stop shower, they're probably better. They have a sit- ‚Ä¶

I like the people that work here. However they are not honoring their shower agreement with purchase of fuel. So you should buy your fuel somewhere else if you are expecting to get the deal that was agreed to. Also you will find just about ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ across from the food kitchen. Kinda odd. Mens bathroom only had 2 stalls, one of which housed a really sketchy looking shower along with a toilet that refused to flush. Typical gas station bathroom stuffs. Parking lot could use a pave. ‚Ä¶
What a sweet treat, to be able to have a warm shower with soft water all for free. Friendly staff too!

If i could take one star away i would. Showers are closed after 9 pm. I needed fuel and food. If i cant shower after 9 pm they arent getting any of my money!!  Who has ever heard of a shower closing at a truck stop??? LAZY PEOPLE!!!
Nice size shower, i come here every 300 days but wort it, the gumbo_hambalaya mix is pretty good made by one the fellow from LA, big size park for semis.
Great! Def and diesel. If you fill up you can get a free shower.  Very clean and they provide towels!
Great deal on a decent truck stop shower, $10 or free with any fuel purchase
Truck stop with lots of gifts & a restaurant, with shower rooms available

locations.title: Flying J Dealer
locations.content: Flying J Dealer may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great place to stop for food, shower, laundry and more!
Waited over 30 minutes for a shower. All doors open no one cleaning them. Should not be selling showers without someone to clean them.
Shower's were very clean i wish every pilot was like this!! The place maintenance is a outstanding never seen a truck stop so clean. Thank you
Diesel fuel lanes were clean, restrooms clean, shower was clean hot water and well ventilated

Awesome food, staff are all very friendly. The shower guy freaking awesome and friendly as well. Thank you all very much!
I spent my 34 reset here.

Traveled a lot, but first time I visited Pilot there was no soap in either the shower or over the sink and not a single towel. Thank you that at least toilet paper and water with light were) In the general toilet is dirty and scattered ‚Ä¶

The manager of this location didn‚Äôt let me shower. I made a reservation on my app I walked in. She said well you weren‚Äôt here waiting. It doesn‚Äôt matter. I was waiting outside in my truck. Is that OK? She was very rude. Very unprofessional. ‚Ä¶

One of the few places where a truck driver can get a hot shower and have plenty of hooks to hang your towels. Also a nice bench to set your clothes on away from the shower stall. Showers wre clean and the hot water didn't go from hot to ‚Ä¶
Clean inside, clean üßº shower üöø, clean restroom, friendly personal. Good truckstop. ‚Ä¶

With the shower that was in this place. I was really very impressed. Because there was  towel everything was clean, there was a soap. Everything clean there is nothing to say even a mint candy. Thank you so much that I found a place like ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Frontier Travel Center
locations.content: Frontier Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Shower was excellent, 11 bucks, clean and hot!!! ‚Ä¶

This place is great, and I say that because of the SHOWERS!!! So cool! Water is SUPER hot and doesn‚Äôt go cold. Only $11 for a shower. Even the towels are fantastic! They have a restaurant where you can order some good food too. The parking ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ clean and free of potholes in the parking lots. The store is large and not cramped feeling with a large variety of snacks, drinks and food. Showers are $8.00 and usually with no waiting. The shower rooms aren't huge, but are decent sized ‚Ä¶

Having lived nearby in Hettinger as a kid and now trucking across the country, this place always has a special spot. The shower, although small, was good. The people were super friendly and provided a great customer experience.
Good food and clean shower

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ staff here! Friendly and professional. The showers are excellent,  hot water to spare and awesome water pressure. We want to thank Bobbie for how clean the shower was she was just a great lady and we enjoyed talking with her. Missy, the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ booked a shower. 2 people ahead in line. waited 40 minutes. line didn't change. went to have a look. 4 shower rooms open after use, no one cleans them for 40 minutes. pilot is the company that has never respected the time of a truck driver! ‚Ä¶
Ridiculous how they can just close down showers because they are ‚Äúunderstaffed ‚Äú ‚Ä¶

Don't take a shower at night; you'll wait longer. Almost an hour still waiting, just one clean shower can't make it. After 2 hours waiting, they will cancel your booking for the shower. If I can give zero stars, I will (updated)
Very clean both showed and rest room, it was nice of the one of the workers asking how was the shower.easy parking no fighting a lot of parking space even after hrs ...
all time late bullshit this pilot truck stop staff very lazy they shower not clean on time i booked shower 1 hours before but anyone did not clean the shower all is empty

I don't s write this. But this place are without control. I pay for shower,and no soap or towel. plus Subway r closed more the times. I buy a dinner plate in fuel counter and this was old food. I asking lady there and she said was a less at ‚Ä¶

Probably one of the last Pilot Flying J‚Äôs in the nation where you can shower without being infested with mold attacks and can also get a hot meal off the HOT bar with a plentiful selection instead of a few stale chicken tenders and a soggy ‚Ä¶

Staff was kind and cheerful. Shower was clean, and had great temps. I do wish it had better pressure but it wasn't terrible. The WiFi needs work. Idk if that's even possible up here but, if I'm paying for premium I should be able to use it ‚Ä¶
Don‚Äôt count on a shower when the store is completely empty in the middle of the night.  First excuse: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm covering for someone‚Äù ‚Ä¶
